name: DarkTower
description:
Made over 3 days for the Minijam: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-103-darkness

Darktower is a vague platformer engulfed in darkness


Controls
WASD - Move
LeftClick - Interact
Spacebar/ ScrollDown - Jump
R - Restart game in case of bugs
Esc/P - Pause

If you try the game out please leave a comment with 1 thing you liked about it and 2 things you disliked about the game

Assets used from
FX Variety Pack 
DungeonLamps
SuperGrid
Sound Phenomenon Fantasy Orchestra 
Defect Ultimate Props Bundle Vol.1
